statements: SELECT * FROM natural_disasters;
SELECT disaster_type, impact_severity FROM natural_disasters;
SELECT location_geography, date_occurred FROM natural_disasters;
SELECT * FROM natural_disasters ORDER BY date_occurred DESC;
SELECT disaster_type, location_geography, impact_severity FROM natural_disasters WHERE impact_severity > 3;
SELECT * FROM natural_disasters WHERE disaster_type='Earthquake' AND impact_severity > 5 ORDER BY date_occurred DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT disaster_id, disaster_type, impact_severity FROM natural_disasters WHERE impact_severity BETWEEN 3 AND 7
SELECT disaster_type, location_geography FROM natural_disasters WHERE impact_severity >= 5 AND disaster_type IN ('Flood', 'Hurricane')
SELECT * FROM natural_disasters ORDER BY impact_severity ASC, date_occurred DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT disaster_id, date_occurred FROM natural_disasters WHERE disaster_type='Tornado' AND location_geography.STContains(GEOGRAPHY::Parse('POINT(-118.4 34.1)'))
SELECT * FROM natural_disasters WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT disaster_name, location FROM natural_disasters ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id FROM natural_disasters;
SELECT disaster_name, location, severity FROM natural_disasters WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY disaster_name;
SELECT disaster_name, location, severity FROM natural_disasters WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY severity ASC;
SELECT id, disaster_name, location, severity FROM natural_disasters WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM natural_disasters WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY disaster_name DESC;
SELECT disaster_name, location FROM natural_disasters WHERE severity = 'Medium' AND location = 'Japan' ORDER BY disaster_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM natural_disasters WHERE severity = 'Low' AND location = 'Italy' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT d.disaster_name, i.factor, i.impact_description FROM natural_disasters d JOIN disaster_impact i ON d.id = i.disaster_id WHERE i.factor = 'Economic Loss' ORDER BY d.disaster_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM NaturalDisasterImpactData;
SELECT location, severity FROM NaturalDisasterImpactData WHERE disaster_type = 'earthquake';
SELECT id, population_size, displaced_count FROM DisasterAffectingPopulation ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM DisasterImpactAnalysis WHERE area_affected LIKE '%California%';
SELECT analysis_date, estimated_loss FROM DisasterImpactAnalysis WHERE estimated_loss > 10000 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM NaturalDisasterImpactData;
SELECT disaster_type, location, severity FROM NaturalDisasterImpactData WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY date_occurred DESC;
SELECT population_size, homeless_count, injured_count FROM DisasterAffectingPopulation WHERE population_size > 100000 AND homeless_count > 5000;
SELECT id, area_affected, estimated_loss FROM DisasterImpactAnalysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND estimated_loss > 1000000 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;

SELECT nd.location, da.population_size, dia.area_affected FROM NaturalDisasterImpactData nd JOIN DisasterAffectingPopulation da ON nd.id = da.id JOIN DisasterImpactAnalysis dia ON da.id = dia.id WHERE nd.severity > 8 AND dia.recovery_efforts LIKE '%ongoing%' ORDER BY nd.date_occurred DESC;
SELECT * FROM natural_disaster_impact;
SELECT location, disaster_type, impact_description FROM natural_disaster_impact WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT id, location, severity FROM natural_disaster_impact WHERE disaster_type = 'Earthquake';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM disaster_locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT severity_level, description FROM disaster_severity_levels WHERE severity_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM natural_disaster_impact WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT location, disaster_type FROM natural_disaster_impact WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM disaster_locations WHERE latitude < 40.0;
SELECT severity_level, description FROM disaster_severity_levels WHERE severity_id = 2;
SELECT impact_description FROM natural_disaster_impact WHERE disaster_type = 'Earthquake' ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM natural_disaster WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT location, density FROM population_density WHERE density < 1000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT type, location, date FROM natural_disaster WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT disaster_type, prediction_confidence FROM disaster_prediction WHERE prediction_confidence >= 80 ORDER BY prediction_confidence DESC;
SELECT id, estimated_impact FROM impact_analysis WHERE disaster_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM natural_disaster WHERE severity > 7 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, density FROM population_density WHERE density < 1000;
SELECT d.id, d.type, p.density FROM natural_disaster d JOIN population_density p ON d.location = p.location WHERE d.severity > 5;
SELECT i.estimated_impact, dp.prediction_confidence FROM impact_analysis i JOIN disaster_prediction dp ON i.disaster_id = dp.id WHERE dp.prediction_confidence > 80;
SELECT s.latitude, s.longitude FROM spatial_distribution s JOIN natural_disaster d ON s.disaster_id = d.id WHERE d.type = 'Earthquake';
